title: 115_hr5045
content: Services, Tools, and Opportunities to Prevent Homelessness Act of 2018 or the STOP Homelessness Act of 2018 This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish the Stop Homelessness Fund for the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) to use to provide housing and services to homeless and formerly homeless individuals. (2) allow individual taxpayers to designate on their tax returns a portion of any overpayment of tax or an additional contribution for the fund. (3) provide appropriations to the fund equal to twice the amount that is designated and contributed by taxpayers to the fund. And (4) require HUD to include in the President's budget, beginning with FY2019, a description of the uses of the fund during the previous fiscal year and the proposed uses for the next fiscal year.
